Package com.informix.json

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ObjectSerializer
    Interface describing methods for serializing an object to a string.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractObjectSerializer  
    Base64Codec
    Provides Base64 encoding and decoding .
    Bytes
    Class that hold definitions of the wire protocol
    Bytes.OptionHolder  
    ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer
    Objects of type ClassMapBasedObjectSerializer are constructed to perform instance specific object to JSON serialization schemes.
    JSON
    Helper methods for JSON serialization and de-serialization
    JSONCallback  
    JSONSerializer  
    JSONSerializer.Builder  
    JSONSerializer.Configuration  
    JSONSerializers
    Defines static methods for getting ObjectSerializer instances that produce various flavors of JSON.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JSONParseException
    Exception throw when invalid JSON is passed to JSONParser.
